org.gramar

Interface IModelAdaptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GramarCsvAdaptor, GramarModelAdaptor, GramarTsvAdaptor, GramarXmlAdaptor

    public interface IModelAdaptor
    A class that is able to convert an input model into an XML DOM
    Author:
    chrisgerken

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean adaptsType(String type)
      Answers whether the receiver is able to convert the given model source type to an XML DOM
      Document asDocument(InputStream stream)
      Reads and converts the content InputStream and then answers the rsulting DOM's document node.
      Document asDocument(Properties properties)
      Converts the source into an XML DOM and answers the DOM's document node.
      Document asDocument(String source)
      Converts the given source content into an XML DOM and answers the DOM's document node.
      String getId()
      Answers the model adaptor ID for this adaptor
      String getType()
      Answers the type of source consumed by this adaptor.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Answers the model adaptor ID for this adaptor
        Returns:
        model adaptor ID

      • getType

        String getType()
        Answers the type of source consumed by this adaptor. Usually is the same as the expected file type of the data (e.g. "xml" or "json". The value should be in lower case.
        Returns:

      • asDocument

        Document asDocument(Properties properties)
                    throws GramarException
        Converts the source into an XML DOM and answers the DOM's document node. This methods is used when additional information must be provided in order to convert the source.
        Parameters:
        properties -
        Returns:
        an XML Document
        Throws:
        GramarException

                    throws GramarException
        Converts the given source content into an XML DOM and answers the DOM's document node.

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • adaptsType

        boolean adaptsType(String type)
        Answers whether the receiver is able to convert the given model source type to an XML DOM
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
        whether this adaptor is an appropriate adaptor for the given source type
